caption:
The photograph features a close-up view of part of a modern, streamlined vehicle, specifically focusing on what appears to be the cockpit or front section. The main color scheme includes a vibrant red with a contrasting white. On the side of the vehicle, the word "TRANSPORTATION" is prominently displayed in large, bold, black letters on a white background.

The front of the vehicle has a rounded shape with windows that seem to wrap partially around its front, providing a wide field of vision. A distinctive logo, which includes a stylized bird in flight within a circle, is visible just behind the cockpit area. The bird logo is red with a white outline, matching the overall color theme.

The background is very minimal, featuring a clear and deep blue sky that suggests a bright, sunny day. This simplicity places all the attention on the vehicle itself. The ground beneath the vehicle is not clearly visible, indicating the photo was taken at a low angle, emphasizing the sleekness and design of the transportation vehicle.

No people are visible in the image, focusing entirely on the vehicle and its design.
title: The LIMTV (linear induction motor test vehicle) is tested at the Dept. of Transportation's high speed ground test center. The experimental vehicle is designed to operate at speeds up to 250 miles per hour. It uses electro-magnetic forces for noiseless propulsion.
